attributes.action: stop smoking with children in cars and in confined spaces
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Children can not stop adults smoking but if it is law to stop them and a finable offence to do so it may help children suffering the affects of passive smoking.
Especially in confined spaces ie cars and houses

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
